title: chanthiranoLiyil
sahitya:
candiranoLiyil avaLaik-kaNDEn sharaNam enru pughundu koNDEn
anupallavi

 indriyangaLai venru viTTEn enadenrAshaiyaik-konru viTTEn

caraNam 1

 payanillAmal uzhaikka shonnAL bhakti sheidu pizhaikka shonnAL
tuyarillAdenai sheidu viTTAL tunbamenbadai koidu viTTAL
   
caraNam 2

 mIngaL sheyyum oLiyai sheidAL vIshi nirkkum vaLiyai sheidAL
vAngaLuLLa veLiya sheidAL vAzhi nenjirk-kaLiyai sheidAL
